abstract: Facebook has been introducing many changes over the last couple of weeks. Here's everything you need to know on the renovations.
snippet: Facebook has been introducing many changes over the last couple of weeks. Here's everything you need to know on the renovations.
lead_paragraph: Over the last few weeks, Facebook has announced so many new features that many users haven't noticed them all yet. It didn't help that many of these features were not actually available to most users when they were announced and then talked about all over the Internet. Now that most of them are available to everyone, here's a catch-up list of the new features.

headline.main: Catching Up on All the New Facebook Features
